item.description:
This release refines focus rewards, tree progress overlays, and focus window behavior.

  • Continuous focus rewards with persisted daily goals, goal-based scaling, and revised reward/overlay flow.
  • Tree progress overlays now support timed visibility, a hotkey toggle, daily-only point adjustments, force-points control, and spark award tracking.
  • Focus window updates show uninterrupted focus in the floating window, keep the timer ticking, and improve return overlay contrast.
  • Updated default focus spark reward settings.
  • Agent instructions updated for libghostty workflows.
